headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Reports Q1 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: The headline numbers for PPG Industries (PPG) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended March 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Tops Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: PPG Industries (PPG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 6.17% and 0.77%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Tops Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: PPG Industries: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: PITTSBURGH (AP) — PPG Industries Inc. PPG) on Tuesday reported first-quarter profit of $373 million. On a per-share basis, the Pittsburgh-based company said it had profit of $1.63.
